ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by (the angels) as swift as blowing winds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then by oath of those that push with a strong gust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then storming on with a tempest's force,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by those who sweep along like gale,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the winds that blow violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the winds that blow violently
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:2] by the raging hurricanes, the violent winds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By the raging hurricanes) and He swore by the violent hurricanes which blow away people's houses,
